headline: Jim Cramer On McCormick (MKC) – Cooking at Home Is the Future!
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Says Tech Might Be “Favored” & Discusses 13 Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. headline: 1 Consumer Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 to Turn Down
summary: Consumer staples are considered safe havens in turbulent markets due to their inelastic demand profiles. Unfortunately, the sector hasn’t provided much protection lately as it pulled back by 9.7% over the past six months. This drop was worse than the S&P 500’s 2% loss.
